original_text: They tied it on the ship with ropes. Then they tied some more ropes under the ship so that it would not break in pieces. The men were afraid of what might happen. There were some places along the coast of Libya where the water was not very deep. The ship might hit one of these places and then it might break. So they took the ship's largest sail down. Then they let the wind blow the ship along.
korean_text: 끌어 올리고 줄을 가지고 선체를 둘러 감고 스르디스에 걸릴까 두려워하여 연장을 내리고 그냥 쫓겨가더니

sentences.original_text: They tied it on the ship with ropes.
Then they tied some more ropes under the ship
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그들은 배 아래에 더 많은 밧줄을 묶었다.

sentences.original_text: so that it would not break in pieces.
The men were afraid of what might happen.
There were some places along the coast of Libya
sentences.korean_translation: 리비아 해안에는 몇 군데 장소가 있었다.

sentences.original_text: where the water was not very deep.
The ship might hit one of these places
sentences.korean_translation: 배가 이 장소 중 하나에 부딪힐 수 있었다.

sentences.original_text: So they took the ship's largest sail down.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 배에서 가장 큰 돛을 내렸다.

sentences.original_text: Then they let the wind blow the ship along.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그들은 바람이 배를 밀어가도록 내버려두었다.
